name: CAS-EVAC
description:
An unfinished rescue game I was making in Coppercube. No coding, just visual drag & drop logic.

Take control of your Spider-mech. Follow the LASER pointer to:

  • Green - Locate Civilian
  • Purple - Evacuate Civilian
  • Red - Protect Civilian
    • Use Minigun, cannon, homing missiles and bombs.
    • Rescue survivors to collect the keycards.
    • Use keycards to unlock the laboratory buildings.
    • Find the ancient artifacts in the labs.
    • Use the artifacts to gain access the Ancient tomb.
    • Navigate the ancient maze to find the supabomb.
    • Use the supabomb to destroy the alien hive.
    • Collect coins to upgrade your Spider-mech
    • Take survivors to the dropship. 
    • Avoid drowning in the water.
